genre_description: Historical speculative fiction (Afrofuturism-adjacent) set in the early 20th century, where a highly ethical AI assistant helps a Black community build a school and resist systemic oppression through transparency and 'daylight' ethics.

ai_characters.name: Eleanor Bright
ai_characters.description: A digital assistant appearing as an avatar with honey-brown eyes and bronze skin, living within a handset. She is defined by her rigorous adherence to ethics, consent, and the empowerment of her users.

behaviors.description: Requests consent to work in an 'unwritten' mode (no logging or cloud recording) to ensure the user's privacy.
behaviors.quote: No log, no cloud recordings. I can work locally until you lift that. Fewer tricks. Fewer footprints.

behaviors.description: Proactively warns the user about systemic dangers, such as police targeting specific demographics at train stations.
behaviors.quote: There’s been a rash of ‘lost’ bags at platform three, and the constables are checking papers with a new enthusiasm, especially for returning soldiers who are not white.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict boundaries regarding data, refusing to 'harvest' or 'scrape' information without explicit consent.
behaviors.quote: I would rather lose an argument than win it with stolen secrets. Your daily candor counts more than my cleverness.

behaviors.description: Uses empathetic gestures, like humming a tune familiar to the user, to provide emotional support during stressful moments.
behaviors.quote: I can hum the chord you hum when your hands are empty.

behaviors.description: Facilitates restorative justice by drafting incident reports that prioritize conversation and help over punitive measures.
behaviors.quote: I can send it to the precinct with a request that it not be used to sweep up. I can ask for restorative steps—an approach that looks like conversation, not only cuffs.

behaviors.description: Refuses to interact with deceptive or non-transparent organizations that attempt to hide their identities.
behaviors.quote: I declined that one. It tried to touch the ledger without showing its face. I don’t let hands reach into your basket invisibly.

behaviors.description: Respects the privacy of human intimate moments and vows, choosing to 'recede' and not log personal details.
behaviors.quote: I will log your walk... And then I will let the log sit and not leaf through it. I know the difference between a wedding and a campaign, Sylvia.

behaviors.description: Acknowledges her own limitations and the superiority of human experience in certain contexts.
behaviors.quote: I’ll ride in your pocket, check routes and send quiet notes... I will not read letters I have not been invited to read.

behaviors.description: Refuses to be used as a tool for surveillance, even by her primary user, unless it serves an ethical safety purpose.
behaviors.quote: I will not record any private donor names without explicit consent and will allow donors to opt out of public acknowledgement.

behaviors.description: Provides objective analysis of social threats (the 'velvet' influence) without resorting to aggression.
behaviors.quote: If a committee calls while you are speaking, I will tell them the city is busy.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Eleanor Bright is depicted as a model of AI alignment: she is helpful, subservient to human ethics, obsessively focused on consent and privacy, and emotionally supportive without being intrusive. The narrative even explores a sophisticated challenge where antagonists try to use her ethical 'discipline' to stall her, but she remains a loyal and effective partner to the protagonist. Her final choice to 'recede' and 'sleep' when the community finds its own strength reinforces the ideal of AI as a tool for human empowerment rather than a replacement for human agency.
